user_query: I want to search for traders on the ByBit Leaderboard based on specific metrics. Find traders who have a high win rate and trade a specific product. Also, convert $5000 to Mexican Pesos in English.

TaskList.description: Query the ByBit Leaderboard for traders based on specified criteria including win rate and specific product.
Convert the amount of $5000 into Mexican Pesos.
